default_response: I'm sorry, I don't understand that question. Could you please rephrase it or ask something else about our gym services?

question: What are your opening hours?
When are you open?
What time do you open?
What are your gym hours?
questions.answer: Our gym is open from 5:00 AM to 11:00 PM Monday through Friday, and 7:00 AM to 9:00 PM on weekends.

question: What membership options do you have?
What types of memberships are available?
Do you offer different membership plans?
questions.answer: We offer three membership tiers: Basic ($29/month), Premium ($49/month), and Platinum ($79/month). Premium includes group classes and Platinum adds personal training sessions.

question: Do you have personal trainers?
Can I get a personal trainer?
Are there trainers available?
questions.answer: Yes, we have certified personal trainers available. You can book sessions individually or as part of our Platinum membership package.

question: What equipment do you have?
What kind of machines are available?
Do you have squat racks?
questions.answer: Our gym is fully equipped with cardio machines, weight training equipment, free weights, functional training areas, and dedicated spaces for stretching and mobility work.

question: Do you offer classes?
What group classes do you have?
Are there any fitness classes?
questions.answer: We offer a variety of group classes including yoga, HIIT, spin, Zumba, Pilates, and strength training. The schedule changes weekly.

question: How do I cancel my membership?
Can I cancel my subscription?
What's the cancellation policy?
questions.answer: You can cancel your membership by visiting the front desk or sending us an email. We require 30 days notice for cancellations.

question: Do you have locker rooms?
Are there showers at the gym?
Can I store my belongings?
questions.answer: Yes, we have fully equipped locker rooms with showers, towels, and secure lockers (bring your own lock).

question: What's your age policy?
Can teenagers join?
Is there a minimum age?
questions.answer: Members must be at least 16 years old. Teens aged 16-17 need parental consent. We offer special youth programs for ages 12-15 with supervision.

question: Do you have parking?
Is there a parking lot?
Where can I park?
questions.answer: We have a dedicated parking lot for members with 50 spaces. Additional street parking is available nearby.

question: What safety measures do you have?
How do you clean equipment?
COVID protocols?
questions.answer: We thoroughly clean all equipment daily, provide sanitizing stations throughout the gym, and enforce strict hygiene protocols. Staff are trained in first aid and CPR.

question: Can I bring a guest?
Do you allow visitors?
Guest policy?
questions.answer: Premium and Platinum members can bring one guest per visit. Basic members can purchase day passes for guests at $15 each.

question: Do you offer nutrition advice?
Can I get diet plans?
Nutrition counseling?
questions.answer: Our Platinum membership includes one nutrition consultation per month. We also offer stand-alone nutrition counseling sessions with our certified dietitian.

question: What should I bring to the gym?
Do I need special shoes?
Gym essentials?
questions.answer: Bring comfortable workout clothes, athletic shoes, a water bottle, and a towel. We recommend a lock for lockers. All other equipment is provided.

question: Do you have a sauna?
Is there a steam room?
What amenities do you offer?
questions.answer: Yes, we have both a sauna and steam room available for all members. These are located in the locker rooms.

question: How do I sign up?
Can I join online?
Membership registration?
questions.answer: You can sign up at the front desk or through our website. We offer a free 3-day trial for new members.
